name: Mr. Pho Vietnamese Restaurant
address: 3331 Coast Meridian Rd, Port Coquitlam, BC V3B 3N6, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Spring Roll / Chả Giò
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried rolls filled with minced pork, shrimp, mushrooms, and vermicelli, served with a side of sweet chili dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Hue Beef / Bún Bò Huế
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy.

hasMenuItem.name: Steak Noodle Soup / Phở Tái
hasMenuItem.description: Tender slices of steak in a savory broth with rice noodles, garnished with fresh herbs, onions, and green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken Salad Roll / Gỏi Cuốn Gà Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken wrapped in rice paper with vermicelli, lettuce, and herbs. Served with a side of dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Wings / Cánh Gà Chiên
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried chicken wings topped with garlic and served with shredded purple cabbage and carrot strips.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Noodle Soup / Phở Gà
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken slices, fresh cilantro, green onions, and crispy fried shallots in a savory broth with rice noodles.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Salad Roll / Gỏi Cuốn
hasMenuItem.description: Shrimp salad rolls, or gỏi cuốn, typically include fresh shrimp, vermicelli noodles, lettuce, and bean sprouts wrapped in rice paper.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken, Spring Roll / Bún Gà Nướng, Chả Giò
hasMenuItem.description: Served with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, pickle radish, carrot, and bean sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich / Bánh Mì Gà Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken sandwich, or bánh mì gà nướng, typically includes a crusty baguette filled with marinated grilled chicken, mayonnaise, pickled daikon and carrot, cucumber, cilantro, and jalapeños.

hasMenuItem.name: Brisket, Beef Ball / Phở Chín Bò Viên
hasMenuItem.description: Rice noodle soup featuring well-done brisket and beef balls, typically includes a savory beef broth, onions, and cilantro.

hasMenuItem.name: Mr. Pho House Special / Phở Đặc Biệt
hasMenuItem.description: Rice noodle soup featuring a rich beef broth, typically includes slices of rare beef, brisket, meatballs, tendon, and tripe, garnished with onions and cilantro.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegeterian / Phở Chay
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried chicken wings topped with garlic and served with shredded purple cabbage and carrot strips.

hasMenuItem.description: Shrimp salad rolls, or gỏi cuốn, typically include fresh shrimp, vermicelli noodles, lettuce, and bean sprouts wrapped in rice paper.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken Salad Roll / Gỏi Cuốn Gà Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken wrapped in rice paper with vermicelli, lettuce, and herbs. Served with a side of dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Pork Salad Roll / Gỏi Cuốn Thịt Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Rice paper wrapped with grilled pork, vermicelli, lettuce, and typically includes cucumber and herbs, served with a dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Salad Roll / Gỏi Cuốn Chay
hasMenuItem.description: Rice paper rolls filled with a blend of fresh vegetables and vermicelli noodles, typically accompanied by a peanut dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Pork Sausage Salad Roll / Nem Cuốn
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled pork sausage wrapped in rice paper with fresh herbs, vermicelli noodles, and vegetables, served with a side of crushed peanut dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Spring Roll / Chả Giò Chạy
hasMenuItem.description: Veggie spring roll typically includes a crispy wrapper filled with a mix of vegetables such as carrot, taro, and mushroom, along with vermicelli and tofu.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Carpaccio / Bò Tái Chanh
hasMenuItem.description: Thinly sliced rare beef, typically marinated in lime juice, garnished with fresh herbs, onions, and peanuts, dressed with a spicy lime-chili vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Papaya Salad / Gỏi Đu Đủ Tôm
hasMenuItem.description: Shredded green papaya, carrots, and fresh herbs topped with shrimp, roasted peanuts, and crispy shallots. Served with a side of chili paste.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Mango Salad / Gỏi Xoài Tôm
hasMenuItem.description: A refreshing mix of fresh mango and shrimp, typically accented with onions, herbs, and peanuts, dressed in a light vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Hue Beef / Bún Bò Huế
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken / Phở Gà Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Rice noodles in a savory broth, topped with marinated and grilled chicken, typically includes green onions, cilantro, and a blend of aromatic herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot & Sour Seafood / Phở Hải Sản Chua Cay
hasMenuItem.description: A vibrant mix of shrimp, fish cakes, crab sticks, and fresh herbs in a tangy and spicy broth.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot & Sour Steak / Phở Tái Chua Cay
hasMenuItem.description: Beef noodle soup with slices of steak, infused with hot and sour flavors, typically includes rice noodles and a variety of herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Nam Vang Seafood / Hủ Tiếu Nam Vang
hasMenuItem.description: Vietnamese-style seafood with a choice of dry or in soup, featuring traditional hủ tiếu nam vang ingredients.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegeterian / Phở Chay
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuSection.name: Vietnamese Sandwich / Bánh Mì Việt Nam

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Pork Sandwich / Bánh Mì Thịt Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled pork on a fresh baguette, typically includes Vietnamese mayonnaise, pickled daikon and carrot, cilantro, cucumber, and jalapeño.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Pork Sausage Sandwich / Bánh Mì Nem Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled pork sausage nestled in a crusty baguette, typically includes pickled carrots and daikon, cucumber, cilantro, and a spread of pate, creating a harmonious blend of textures and flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Egg Sandwich / Bánh Mì Ốp La
hasMenuItem.description: A Vietnamese baguette filled with fried eggs, complemented by pickled vegetables, cucumber, cilantro, and a spread of mayonnaise and pâté.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich / Bánh Mì Gà Nướng
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken sandwich, or bánh mì gà nướng, typically includes a crusty baguette filled with marinated grilled chicken, mayonnaise, pickled daikon and carrot, cucumber, cilantro, and jalapeños.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian Sandwich (Vegan Ham) / Bánh Mì Chay
hasMenuItem.description: Vegan.

review.reviewBody: The steak pho noodle soup amazing same with the spring rolls and the shrimp salad rolls
Large portions and came fresh! Would definitely order again!
Excellent spring rolls and the portion was huge!
Grilled Pork Chop / Cơm Sườn Nướng at thìs place is so horrible! It's boiled not grilled! I will never ordered here again!
